column19: North East and North Cumbria Lead Employer Trust
column23: LET is commissioned by Health Education England in the North East and North Cumbria (HEE NE) to employ all postgraduate doctors and postgraduate learners across the region for the duration of their training. Northumbria Healthcare NHS Foundation Trust is the LET for HEE NE
column48: Like 95% of surveyed organisations, a cycle to work scheme is avalible for staff.

column52: While this limit shows they have recently reviewed the scheme, it suggests that the organisational group who did so does not have a broad understanding of bikes and ebikes on the market. This may affect who can reasonably ride to work, as they may not be able to afford the bike that will allow them to replace their car with a cargo bike, for example.
column53: This organisation is one of the 36% of organisations to offer secure bike parking.
column54: They state that they also have bike hubs, which has facilities that are specifically designed to enable cycling. Only 3% of organisations offer this.
column55: This organisation offers showers and changing rooms, like a third of organisations surveyed.
column57: The following are provided to help you gain confidence in cycling:
column59: • Training to help you be more confident on the road
column62: • The oportunity to loan a bike for a short period to see how cycling can work for you.
column65: Local bike maintinance events such as Dr Bike sessions are run by this organisation to help you keep your bike in good working order.
column66: Communal tools are avalible for you to fix those minor cycling breakdowns.
column67: Discounts are avalible to help employees cycle to work.
